thread.title: great location near Spanish steps
thread.title_full: great location near Spanish steps - Review of Hotel Forte, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: botumasz
title: great location near Spanish steps
text:
Rooms are on first floor, via a very "cool" elevator. breakfast was ok. staff was helpful, although they could not find an English News channel (BBC or CNN).
Location was 2 blocks from Spanish steps and 15 minute walk from Trevi fountain and Pantheon.
Watch Roman Holiday movie before you go. Gregory Peck's aparment was at via Margutta 51.
